verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅre nikaṭe vasāilā
'sanātanera vārtā kaha'--tāṅhāre puchilā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—them; nikaṭe—near Him; vasāilā—sat down; sanātanera vārtā—news of Sanātana; kaha—please tell; tāṅhāre—them; puchilā—questioned.
translation: After this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sat them down by His side and asked them, "What news do you have of Sanātana?"
